verses.verse: Now<WG1161> I<WG1473>, Paul<WG3972>, <WG846> beg<WG3870> you<WG5209> by<WG1223> the meekness<WG4236> and<WG2532> gentleness<WG1932> of Christ<WG5547>; I who<WG3739> in<WG2596> your presence<WG4383> am<WG3303> lowly<WG5011> among<WG1722> you<WG5213>, but<WG1161> being absent<WG548> I am bold<WG2292> towards<WG1519> you<WG5209>:

For<WG3754> his letters<WG3303>, say they<WG5346>, are weighty<WG926> and<WG2532> powerful<WG2478>; but<WG1161> his bodily<WG4983> presence<WG3952> is weak<WG772>, and<WG2532> his speech<WG3056> contemptible<WG1848>.

Let<WG3049> such a one<WG5108> consider<WG3049> this<WG5124>, that<WG3754>, such as<WG3634> we are<WG2070> in word<WG3056> by<WG1223> letters<WG1992> when we are absent<WG548>, such<WG5108> will we be also<WG2532> in deed<WG2041> when we are present<WG3918>.

For<WG1063> we dare<WG5111> not<WG3756> number<WG1469> ourselves or<WG2228> compare<WG4793> ourselves<WG1438> with some<WG5100> that commend<WG4921> themselves<WG1438>: but<WG235> they<WG846>, measuring<WG3354> themselves<WG1438> by<WG1722> themselves<WG1438>, and<WG2532> comparing<WG4793> themselves<WG1438> among themselves<WG1438>, are<WG4920> not<WG3756> wise<WG4920>.

But<WG1161> we<WG2249> will<WG2744> not<WG3780> boast<WG2744> of<WG1519> things<WG3588> beyond<WG280> our limits<WG280>, but<WG235> according to<WG2596> the measure<WG3358> of the ruler<WG2583> which<WG3739> God<WG2316> has distributed<WG3307> to us<WG2254>, a measure<WG3358> to reach<WG2185> even<WG2532> to<WG891> you<WG5216>.
